dialogues.text: There's plenty of time for tubbin'. Let's ski.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the top of the mountain, Adam, Nick, and Lou look ridiculous in TIGHT, RETRO-STYLE NEON SKI JUMPSUITS. Jaco on a snowboard, is the only one dressed in current attire

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: their outfits) When's the last time you guys actually went skiing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been a few years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we look good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you're an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, we race down the mountain. Loser buys first round. Premium shit only.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gonna be all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno - do black dudes ski?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course black dudes ski. Aren't I wearing skis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just not sure you're representative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're calling me an Uncle Tom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't even know what that means.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It means black dudes ski. (pulls down goggles) Catch ya at the bottom. Nick takes off and... gets about 15 FEET, before he hits GRASSY PATCH and falls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black dudes don't ski.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's the bottom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick wears his "going out clothes" and walks along the ma drag talking into his PHONE. It is clear that he is being CONSTANTLY INTERRUPTED on the other end of the conversati

dialogues.speaker: NICK, (ON PHONE)
dialogues.text: No, the black ones... without the pleats... Because the pleats make me look fat... No, I put it on the Amex... Because I'm the best man... I know, but I'm organizing... I'm gonna get cash fr-- I'm gonna get-- I'm gonna collect cash from the guys... Yes... Yes... Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you too. Nick hangs up and we see that Adam, Lou, and Jacob have b walking with him, listening to his end of the conversatio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, who's ready to sink their teeth into a delicious dinner?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our four guys looks MISERABLE, as they sit around a table this popular Chinese food chain restaurant. Their overzealous WAITER (AIDEN) makes a big production of MIXI SAUCES, like he's Emeril.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fellas look like you can handle some spice. I'm gonna knock it up a bit... throw some chili sauce in there... oh yeah, there it is. This is gonna knock your socks off.
Nick's expression looks like he wants to kill the guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. The waiter walks away and Nick RAISES HIS GLASS in a toas

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd like to propose a toast. To my best friend, Adam. He may be throwing his life away, but at least he's throwing it away with a hot chick at his side. The guys LAUGH and clink glasses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so what if you only have one vagina for the rest of your life. Speaking as someone who's seen your wife's vagina -- it's definitely one of the good ones. Lou and Jacob look confused, but clink glasses anyway, as Adam mouths "What the fuck" to Nick. Jacob raises his glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To my brother, I say thank you for including me. I promise to try to make the most of it. The guys look confused at the backhanded graciousness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for coming, man. It means a lot to me. Jacob nods halfheartedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Adam!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Adam! The guys hug and clink glasses and excitedly CHATTER. Jus then, a MANAGER appears at the table and CLEARS HIS THROA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen. You're going to have to keep it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 25 NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, man. It's our friend's bachelor party. We're just trying to roast him a little bit. MANAGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well if you like roasts, I suggest the roast peking duck. It's out of this world and as I'm sure Aiden has told you, he can make it quite spicy. The guys look bothered. MANAGER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But as for the noisy kind of roast, that's going to have to stop. We have many other guests trying to enjoy the P.F. Chang's experience. The manager walks away. For a moment, the guys are quiet. Lou takes a bite of his food, chewing slowly. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This kung pau chicken pairs very nicely with the 97 cab. Very impressive choice, Nick. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Also, this is the worst bachelor party I've ever been to. Everyone puts down their forks, cathartically fed up. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Totally agree. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick, look. You had great intentions. No one's blaming you. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm blaming him. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm totally blaming him. I didn't even want to go skiing.
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK I'll admit this trip is not off to the best start. But we're due for a victory! Nick thinks and actually gets an idea. He SNAPS his finge NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot tub! A lightbulb goes off for Adam too. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Lou gets up and throws down his napkin. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did we even bother with dinner? Adam and Nick get up too. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, I'm still hungry. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet, men are talking. Aiden approaches. AIDEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get you guys some to-go boxes? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would like you to die. And then I would like you to leave. Aiden walks away, freaked out. Lou turns back to the guys LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's tub time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou, Adam, and Nick all have HUGE SMILES, as they gaze at tub. They each hold a TON OF BOOZE. Jacob looks indifferent and a little turned off by it all Lou strips down to his underwear and CLIMBS IN. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god. The water is perfect.
He POURS A VODKA and SLAMS IT BACK. Adam climbs in with Lou, pouring his own drink. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really don't see the appeal. It's like a glorified bath. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob. Son. The hot tub is the whole thing! You ski all day. Then you hit the town, get trashed, and lure some fine ladies back to the lodge for some good old fashioned tubbin'. Nick CRACKS A BEER and pats Jacob on the back. NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So the town's dead? Fine, we skip that part and go right to the tub. Trust me. If there's fun to be had, the tub is a good start. Nick gets in. NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! It's amazing. Now it's just Jacob outside the hot tub. The other three guys are already starting to look more energized and happ splashing around. After another beat of consideration... JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck it. Jacob strips down and gets in. As he submerges, he actual starts to loosen up a bit and smiles. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not convinced this is anything more than a bath, but it's nice. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit him with some bubbles. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming right up. Adam CRANKS A KNOB. As the BUBBLES comes to life, we begi TUBBIN' MONTAGE over Reel 2 Real's "I Like to Move It."

-- In the tub, the guys DRINK like fish, pouring various combinations of VODKA, RED BULL, MOUNTAIN DEW, BACARDI, a anything else they can get their hands on. -- Jacob's LAPTOP is propped on the edge of the tub, play BETTER OFF DEAD. Every so often, one of our guys takes a drink, playing a game, the rules of which only they know. -- Adam takes a big bite of the SANDWICH Lily gave him. -- Nick uses his iPhone to take video and pictures. More drinking games. The guys wear funny HATS and roll dice on a PIECE OF WOOD. Adam has to drink some tub water -- The guys keep reaching into ADAM'S BACKPACK for MIXERS -- Nick, Adam, and Lou LAUGH. Then, Lou lifts up Jacob's head, which he has been FORCIBLY HOLDING UNDER WATER. Jac coughs and spits out water and looks pissed. Then he smil and helps submerge Nick's head in the same way. -- Slam! Another bottle of vodka killed. Crush! Another empty Red Bull his the patio. -- A BEAR eats some DORITOS that have been left on a PICN TABLE. Yards away in the tub, the guys laugh and taunt it -- Lou BLEEDS from where the bear has obviously SCRATCHED across the chest. Still, he dances in the tub. -- Just for an instant (did we see that?), the guys are 3 BLACK GUYS and ONE WHITE GUY, before changing back. -- The guys wear their SNOWSUITS in the tub. Adam very dangerously jumps in, attached to a SNOWBOARD. -- The CUTS get QUICKER and QUICKER, as hands reach into backpack. More vodka. More Dew. More Red Bull. More Bacardi... The cuts SPEED UP and INTENSIFY until finally BRILLIANT FLASH OF LIGHT, we EXPLODE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the light of a new day spills into Havenhurst, we find four of our guys PASSED OUT in the hot tub, the water cal A KITTEN licks Lou's face. It's adorable. Until...
Lou JOLTS AWAKE and PUKES ON THE KITTEN, sending it FLYIN This wakes up everyone and they stir to life, inspecting carnage, mostly hangover-related. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, I wanna die. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a vitamin water. Adam reaches in his backpack, taking out two choices. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Bull or Fresca? Jacob takes the Fresca, as Lou inspects the CLAW MARKS. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That fucking bear got me good. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah he did. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we showed him, didn't we? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If by showing him, you mean we laughed and he got bored and wandered off into the woods with your sneakers, then yeah, we got him good. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck yeah. Lou picks up Adam's half-eaten sandwich and takes a BITE. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just puked. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why I'm eating your sandwich. I'm fucking starving. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, look... Their gaze turns to the MOUNTAIN PEAK, on which is a fres LAYER OF POWDER. It looks like perfect skiing conditions. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the guys walk across the front of the lodge, they pass some well preserved CARS all parked together: a 1985 Pont Fiero, a 1986 VW Golf, and a 1987 Ford Mustang coupe. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this, a shitty car club? The guys COMPLETELY MISS the BILLBOARDS ACROSS THE STREET -- "Coming soon: the most spaced-out Mel Brooks film yet!

dialogues.speaker: SPACEBALLS
dialogues.text: -- A surfing MAX HEADROOM with a CAN OF COKE and the tag: "Catch the Wave!" -- A bull terrier named SPUDS MCKENZIE parking with some BABES and a shitload of BUD LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In QUICK CUTS, the guys hit the slopes: -- In his ridiculous snowsuit, Nick skis down the mountai With the new snowfall, he expertly glides along. -- Jacob applies some LIP BALM and flies down the mountai a SNOWBOARD. People glare at him with confused expression -- Adam uses the snowplow method to slowly descend. He's beginner skier. He takes the time to look at the surroundings and notices a YOUNGER, HOTTER CROWD skiing today. Lots of BLONDE SKI BUNNIES wearing PASTEL colors. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well this place has improved. -- In the lift line, Lou passes a GUY wearing a BIG HEADB LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really, asshole?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam shares a gondola with Nick, as they make their way u the mountain. A DUDE IN SUNGLASSES sits across, napping. Adam takes a FLASK out of his backpack. He and Nick look over their shoulders like scheming kids as they take a ni
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm really glad we stayed. It's gonna be good to get away for a couple of days. (QUALIFYING BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean not like I want to be away from Lily. You know. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Believe me I know. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love her. But you guys are right. I'm gonna be with her for the rest of my life. NICK (NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the rest of your goddamn life. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It gets easier, right? No offense, but watching you talk with Courtney- NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna be fine. You'll settle in, get the premium cable package - the usual deal. Adam nods. NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll wake up every morning, comforted by the fact that your wife doesn't wield her family's wealth over your head like a hangman's noose. Adam looks concerned, as Nick wistfully goes on... NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll breathe the air of life, making the occasional decision - maybe get some lawn furniture. How about steak for dinner? Yes, let's get that juice machine I saw on TV. Let's fucking go for it. Nick stares off into the distance. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick?
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, I lost myself there.

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Coke? Adam and Nick look at the guy across from them, who prese offers his SKI GOGGLES, on which is a mountain of COCAINE NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is a lot of cocaine. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel like we're in Scarface. Only with skiing. (THINKS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skiface.

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES
dialogues.text: (SNIFFS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it. It's good shit. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna pass. ADAM (DECLINES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm good. The dude removes his sunglasses. He has a dead look in hi eyes, studying Nick and Adam.

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES
dialogues.text: You guys a couple of spazzes? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spazzes?

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES
dialogues.text: (VERY ANGRY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, dipstick. You narcs? You Miami Vice? Which one's Crockett? Which one's CROCKETT?! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Crockett, obviously! (TO NICK)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the Don Johnson one, right? The dude flips out a SWITCHBLADE.

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES
dialogues.text: You show me you're not spazzes.
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not spazzes. The dude extends the coke once more.

dialogues.speaker: DUDE IN SUNGLASSES
dialogues.text: Show me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the top of the mountain, Nick looks WIDE AWAKE. Adam, the other hand, looks COKED OUT OF HIS SKULL. He sniffs, fidgets, clenches his jaw, and looks generally "up." NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, you gotta chill. You just did one line. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never ridden the horse before. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not riding the horse. The horse is heroin. Adam can't stop moving and fidgeting. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what kind of animal I'm riding, but it's the best animal of all time. I feel great! Adam uses his SKI POLES to push off the top of the mounta and he goes FLYING DOWN THE SLOPE. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam! Jesus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam TUCKS down, still CLENCHING HIS TEETH. He PICKS UP SPEED as he flies down the mountain like a racer.

dialogues.speaker: FURTHER UP THE MOUNTAIN
dialogues.text: Nick has to pull up and slow down in the name of safety.
ON ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He zips along, never changing course or slowing. He BAREL MISSES a few TREES. But he can't stop himself before --

dialogues.speaker: HE BARRELS INTO A SMOKING HOT CHICK
dialogues.text: The collision knocks Adam and the girl to the ground and finally stops Adam's hyper-speed descent. Adam gets up and shakes the cobwebs. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a rush! He notices the girl on the ground and goes to help her up ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh wow, are you OK?

dialogues.speaker: SMOKING HOT CHICK
dialogues.text: No thanks to you, asshole!

dialogues.speaker: IN SLOW MOTION --
dialogues.text: The girl stands up in a very hot and awesome manner, SHAK THE SNOW from her luxurious blonde hair. It twinkles in t sunlight. As she turns to face Adam, NORMAL SPEED RESUMES. And he sees who it is: ADAM (MIND BLOWN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jennie O'Keefe! Jennie squints at Adam, trying to place him. JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I know you? He stares at her, not believing what he's seeing. He stil looks loopy from the coke. Just then, a a too-blond, mirror-sunglass-wearing, feathe hair, striped-jumpsuited guy (BLAINE) SKIS UP and GRABS A BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna serve you a knuckle sandwich, airhead. (TO JENNIE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You all right, babe? JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so.
Blaine's TOADIES (TAD and CHAZ) ski up behind him, as Bla ANGRILY RIPS Adam's lift ticket from his jacket. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your lift ticket's been revoked. Blaine throws it on the ground and laughs to his friends. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a la Lethal Weapon 2) Diplomatic immunity. Blaine looks confused, as Adam RIPS Blaine's lift ticket, he ends up RIPPING BLAINE'S JACKET too. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, I was trying to... you can probably patch that up. Blaine PULLS Adam close by the collar and clenches his fi BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead meat, scumbag. Just then, SNOW POWDER flies in Blaine's face. Blaine let go of Adam, as Jacob snowboards up and stops short, comin his brother's side. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are! My brother's had a few too many triple Venti nonfat lattes if you know what I mean. (genuine, to Adam) Are you OK? Adam nods. Blaine looks confused. CHAZ and TAD look enamored with Jacob. CHAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, they let you bring a skateboard on the mountain? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a snowboard. You know - no wheels. TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Genius! Man, not to get all fag on you, but I'm digging your fresh threads, bro. Adam and Blaine look equally confused with what's going o Jacob takes the compliment well, like he deserves it.
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. It's mostly North Face. A little EMS. CHAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever it is, it works. TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Totally. What are you doing with this boner? You should be skiing with us. Like permanently. Blaine looks really annoyed with his friends. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, that's if Blaine thinks it's cool and everything. Blaine takes a deep breath, annoyed. BLAINE (TO JACOB)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your spaz brother out of here. And for his sake, I don't wanna see him back on my mountain. CHAZ (EAGER)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome any time though! Adam picks up his BACKPACK, which fell off during the collision. He stares at Jennie again and smiles. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look JUST like this girl. I had the biggest crush on her-- Blaine grabs the bag out of Adam's hand and SHOVES ADAM a BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is mine now. Adam looks at Blaine angrily, but Jacob holds him back. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Let's just go. Jacob ushers Adam off the slope, as Blaine shoulders the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Jacob walk in the front door. Gone are the child and old people. The living room off the lobby presently hosts what appears to be an amazing 80s RETRO PARTY. A ra plays Miami Sound Machine's "Conga." Girls and guys wear printed sweaters, feathered dos, and leggings. It's something out of a mid-80s Aspen photo sho Nick walks in behind them, looking as confused as them. H turns up his palms and shakes his head, at a loss for wor ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is going on? Lou strolls up to the guys, with his arms around TWO HOT CHICKS. He looks elated. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! I'm so glad you're here. I want to introduce you to Michelle and Sandy. These lovely ladies are having a roller skating party next weekend and no offense, but fuck your wedding -- I'm totally coming back. By the way... Lou rolls out a ZIPLOCK BAG full of cocaine. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's coke everywhere around here. This place rules! Lou dips into the coke and rubs it on his gums and we: CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The suite looks a little "fresher." The furniture is the same, but everything's in better shape. It looks almost n Adam, Jacob, and Lou sit in the main room with the TV on, Nick emerges from a bedroom. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has anyone else noticed that things around here are weird as shit? Adam and Nick nod. Lou shakes his head.
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ruin this. If you wake me from this dream, I'll kill you. ADAM (IGNORING LOU)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think happened? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no idea, but look... Jacob turns up the VOLUME on the TV. The NEWS airs.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed just above 2,000 today... NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm ruined!

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: In other news, the Tower Commission has rebuked President Reagan for not controlling his national security staff in an arms-for- hostages deal with Iran... For a moment, the guys sit there in stunned silence. Then LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with genuine emotion) We're in 1971. ADAM (CORRECTING HIM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in 1987. Everyone looks stunned and dazed. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we gonna do? I have plans next weekend. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all have plans. It's my fucking wedding! NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now hold on, we don't know for sure that we're in 1987. The TV shows a (real) COMMERCIAL for the COMMODORE 64 computer, with a JINGLE that SINGS: "Are you keeping up w the Commodore, 'cause the Commodore's keeping up with you
When it's over... NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, we're in 1987. Adam stands up, completely losing it. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the FUCK is going on?! Nick stands up and calmly takes charge. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone relax. I think I know what's happened. And when we're done discussing it, we're all gonna feel a lot better. Everyone looks to Nick, who seems to have the answer. NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two words: black hole. He lets it hang in the air for a moment, as if it's sudde going to gel for everyone. But the guys look confused. NICK (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw a special on the Science Channel. And guess what? Sometimes this happens. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This happens? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. And the best thing for us to do is to stay put. The universe will eventually reverse itself and work out this little glitch. Nick sits down, looking satisfied in his know-it-all-ness ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a big glitch. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you're an idiot. Black holes are in space. Not at a ski resort. LOU (HOPEFUL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So does this mean we get to go to girls' locker rooms and see them naked and they can't see us?
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, we traveled through time. We're not invisible. Lou looks upset. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) I'm still gonna do it. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, ignoring the ridiculousness of how we got here for a moment-- NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black hole. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are we supposed to get back? For a moment, everyone sits and absorbs the question. The LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We find a scientist. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our guys WAIT NERVOUSLY near a RECEPTION DESK, above whic the "IBM" logo. Lou reads a MAGAZINE. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This Dukakis guy seems like he might be the real deal. An affable MAN IN A SUIT approaches.

dialogues.speaker: MAN IN SUIT
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, how may I help you? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're waiting for a scientist.

dialogues.speaker: MAN IN SUIT
dialogues.text: I am a scientist. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's your white coat? SCIENTIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not that kind of scientist.
Lou stands up and throws down his magazine. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is bullshit! I told you-- ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. Just tell him. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK. You tell him, Adam. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we... (EMBARRASSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is ridiculous. SCIENTIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's too ridiculous in the name of science. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're from the future. SCIENTIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the fuck out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECURITY GUARD escorts our guys out of the building. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That went well. Lou starts walking off by himself. NICK (TO LOU)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going? Lou points to his watch. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five o'clock. Happy hour. The guys look at him, confused. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's '87, the PF Chang's will be gone, which means the Brew Haus still stands. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Saturday. They have wet T- shirt contests on Saturdays.
The guys' eyebrows raise. After a moment: ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, maybe one drink. Just to confirm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPLASH! A WET T-SHIRT CONTEST is underway on a STAGE. Whitesnake on the juke, PAC MAN on the tables, and cheap beers in the mugs - this is an amazing brew pub. Our guys sit in the back, wearing PINE VALLEY LODGE shirt There are MANY EMPTIES on the table and they look VERY DR In a roped-off area in the corner, a cocky YOUNGER PHIL ( one-armed bellhop) wields a CHAINSAW that he uses to carv ICE SCULPTURE, impressing the bar crowd. He has BOTH ARMS NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit. It's that bellhop. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should we warn him? ADAM (COVERS EYES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to see this go down. Phil TOSSES THE CHAINSAW IN THE AIR and... He expertly CATCHES IT, seamlessly continuing to carve. A GIRL leans in and gives him a kiss. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck that guy. ON THE STAGE, TWO GIRLS compete for wettest t-shirt. They both decide that NO T-SHIRT is the wettest option. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God bless our country. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a daze) We're in 1987. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can stop saying that. I don't think it's making a difference.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seriously, we have to get back. (kinda losing it) We seriously have to get back! The guys subdue Adam, as a BIG-HAIRED WAITRESS brings dri WAITRESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here ya go, guys. Three Buds, one Bartles and James. The guys all stare at her like she's a museum artifact. WAITRESS (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? I have lipstick on my teeth? Nick sips his WINE COOLER, feeling the eyes of the others him. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, if it's available, I'm ordering it. I always wanted one of these when I was little. The waitress puts down the CHECK. Jacob picks it up, realizing something. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the waitress) Can you give us a second? She walks away, as Jacob turns to the guys. JACOB (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is gonna be a problem. He takes out his wallet, showing his CREDIT CARDS and CAS JACOB (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, we're in trouble. Our cards aren't gonna work and our new money looks fake. The guys look concerned, but then Nick notices something: A TABLE FULL OF JAPANESE BUSINESSMEN. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got an idea. As Nick gets up and approaches the businessmen, Adam look around the room and by the bar, he spots --
Jennie. He stares at her from across the room. Lou and Jacob noti ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I still can't believe it's really her! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's aged remarkably well. (REMEMBERS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, right. Why don't you just go talk to her? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should go talk to her. To apologize, of course. You know, nothing inappropriate. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure... Adam GETS UP. He slowly makes his way over across the roo Jennie is talking to TWO OTHER GIRLS as Adam approaches. lurks near them like a creep. Jennie eventually notices h as he keeps stealing glances. She doesn't look happy. JENNIE (TO ADAM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen putz, if you're gonna try to attack me again, my boyfriend will be here soon. He'll kick your ass. Adam tries to be casual. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no. No ass kicking. I just wanted to say I'm sorry about earlier. I lost control of the old skis there. (LAUGHS NERVOUSLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like I shoulda taken another one of your classes! JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When did you take my class? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Certainly not when I was a kid! I mean, that would make no sense! Adam tries to recover.
ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was here for a convention. Power tools. And regular tools. All sorts of tools. I'm big into tools. It was a couple years ago. Jennie looks very suspect of Adam. JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, OK. Have a good night. Jennie starts to walk away with her friends. ADAM (TOO FRIENDLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, where ya going? She ignores him, but one of her friends quietly lags behi JENNIE'S FRIEND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly, to Adam) Are you with that guy over there? She discretely points out Jacob. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, he's my brother. She takes Adam's PALM and writes something on it. JENNIE'S FRIEND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a party later tonight at this address. Make sure he comes with you. He's way boss! Adam walks back to his friends. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd it go? He shows them his palm. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got invited to a party later. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sweet! What are we gonna do until then? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about figure out how the hell to get back to the present day? Nick walks back to the table and SLAMS down a pile of CAS
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bam! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're millionaires! NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close. It's a thousand bucks. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get that money? Nick points out the Japanese Businessmen. NICK (PROUDLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sold them my iPod. Jacob looks incredulous. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was NOT a good idea! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I agree. You left so much money on the table. It's a fucking iPod! You could've gotten a LOT more! JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not what I-- ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at watch) Fellas, we are not making progress and we're losing time. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, don't worry. Time's not moving forward in the future. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah it is. Lest we forget the lessons learned from Bill and Ted. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then I give you Back to the Future. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not fair. You can't go right to Back to the Future. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to the Future had a time machine. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well so did Bill and Ted. ADAM (REALIZES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, that's it! I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I think we have a time machine. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, all we did is get drunk in the hot tub. Everyone's EYES GO WIDE. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (puts it together) A hot tub time machine. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All four guys soak in the tub. They TOAST with drinks. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here goes nothing! They simultaneously DOWN their drinks. Nothing happens. Like the chimps in 2001, each of them begins FIDDLING WIT KNOBS and PUSHING ON LIGHTS, trying to find the magic but After a few moments: NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it was worth a shot. ANGLE WIDENS to reveal other PEOPLE in the tub. A GUY AND GIRL make out, two STONERS pass a joint, and one TOPLESS CHICK just chills out. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stares at girl) I love this place. As Lou pours himself another, Adam starts to lose it agai ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, we're running out of ideas here! (MORE)
ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean we tried the scientist, the tub -- what the fuck do we do next? Lou DOWNS ANOTHER SHOT and gets a crazy look in his eye. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what we do next. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DELOREAN is parked in the empty lot. Adam, Nick, and Ja look at it, drunkenly and bleary-eyed. Adam and Nick trad swigs from a BOTTLE OF WHISKEY. The gull wing door opens and Lou steps out, in a foul moo LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rental car agency fucked us! There's no flux capacitor. Lou pulls Jacob over and straps him in the driver's seat, before walking around to the passenger side. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Adam and Nick) We'll travel to 2010. Then one of us will come back and get one of you. And so on and so forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou sits in the passenger seat next to Jacob. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go light on the clutch. I don't wanna lose our deposit. Jacob starts the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Nick watch the car pull out of the parking lot. ADAM (SOBERING SLIGHTLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This will not end well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob and Lou hit the road, picking up speed. They pass a COP, who pulls out, turning on his LIGHTS AND SIREN. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit, they found me! I don't know how but they found me! (LAUGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always wanted to say that. Punch it! Jacob HITS THE GAS. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see the look on this pig's face when we hit 88 and disappear into thin air! Yeah! The SPEEDOMETER hits 75, 80, 85, and then 90. And then 95 The car SHAKES VIOLENTLY. LOU (CONT'D) (SURPRISED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This thing's a piece of shit. Up ahead, the ROAD CURVES DRASTICALLY. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Lou? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? JACOB (VERY CALM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're doing a hundred. I can't control this car. LOU (NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hear ya.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Delorean BRAKES, but doesn't make the turn. It FLIPS OVER in a fantastic disaster and comes to a stop in a DIT The COP pulls over, gets out of his car, and DRAWS HIS GU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Nick watch the accident from a distance. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So do you think we should run away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking ragged as hell, the four guys walk into the room silently collapse on various BEDS and COUCHES. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wonder if we'll still be here for our court appearance. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we're still here in four months, I will happily go to jail, because I'll be fucked anyway. A GUY walks out of the bathroom, wearing only a TOWEL. He looks startled. TOWEL GUY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell are you dweebs?! Lou is up IN A FLASH. He IMMEDIATELY DECKS THE GUY OUT CO and PUMMELS HIM on the floor! The others pull him off. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ, what the hell, Lou?! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no tolerance for intruders. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is probably his room! We're not registered here in 87. Lou thinks for a moment and looks a "little" sorry. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still pretty OK with it. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a problem. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just help me put him outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys open the door to the suite and find TWO DUDES walking by. Adam stops them. ADAM (AWKWARDLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Dudes. Our friend's... hellaciously wasted. He partied pretty hearty... to the max. To the extreme max. DUDE #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bodacious. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you guys wanna fuck with him or what? DUDE #2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent. The dudes take custody of the passed out TOWEL GUY and continue on down the hall, as our guys go back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys look physically exhausted. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's just go to sleep. We'll figure everything out in the morning. It's pretty late. Jacob checks his watch, rolling his eyes. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's 8:45. The other guys look at their watches, surprised. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why am I so wiped out? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you're old and lame? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, fuck that, we're going to that party! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are not going to the party.
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hear me out. Lou paces around the room like Patton addressing the troo LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We saw the scientist. He was worthless. We tried the tub. Dead end. I got us a fucking time machine. From Hertz. It might as well have been a Nissan. Adam shakes his head, as Lou continues. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, it's fucking 1987. Nixon's in the White House, gas is free, and we're about to put a man on the moon! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did we go to the same school? Lou turns and addresses Adam directly. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The point is you haven't even met your wife yet! She can't fault you for shit that went down 23 years ago! Even if 23 years ago somehow ends up being tonight! Adam starts listening a little more closely, as some of L logic actually makes "some" sense. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time to start facing the fact that we may not be going home. And if that's so, then we owe it to ourselves to make the best life we can for ourselves. The guys listen intently, as Lou's speech reaches a passionate climax. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I don't want to be that college freshman who spends the first semester hiding in his dorm room, only to realize that come spring, he has no friends. (MORE PASSIONATE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: LOU, (CONT' D)
dialogues.text: I want to be that college freshman who fucks chicks way out of his league before they have an opportunity to realize he's not as cool as he's pretending to be! Nick nods. Even Jacob smiles. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you with me? ADAM (CONFUSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close enough. We'll talk some more at the party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like the 80s exploded. Music, clothes, hair, attitud it's all on overdrive. In one section, PARTY-GOERS marvel DUCK HUNT, while in another area, people make out and dan Adam, Nick, Lou, and Jacob walk in the front door. They h updated their "looks" with 80s sweaters and other era- appropriate attire. They all look ridiculous, except for Jacob, whose youth lends him hipster appeal. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This sweater makes me look like a jerkof f . LOU (BREATHES DEEPLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to be home. In a corner, Phil puts his ARM in a SHARK TANK. Just as t shark goes to bite, he PULLS HIS ARM OUT, unscathed. A sm crowd claps. Our guys are confused and upset. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was this like an 80s thing? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he doesn't lose that arm soon, I'm gonna take it from him myself. With that, Lou wanders off toward another room, leering a and groping girls as he goes.
ADAM (RE: LOU)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gonna be a problem. Tad and Chaz walk over, looking dapper and douchey. They excited to see Jacob. TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, glad you could make it! ADAM (ANNOYED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your party? CHAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey man, no hard feelings, all right? If your bro says you're cool, then we're cool. Tad puts his arm around Jacob and leads him into the part TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's some people I want you to meet. By the way, bodacious hair. Incredibly chic. JACOB (FLATTERED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? It doesn't really take that much product. It's all in the layering. TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. Product. You're blowing my mind right now. Did you spend time in Europe? CHAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell me. Prague. Do you want some coke? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have Coke Zero? TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, a conscientious objector. I like that. Gotta stay sharp.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE KITCHEN
dialogues.text: Nick mixes something in a large bowl, as plenty of EAGER PARTY-GOERS look on. He pours a red liquid into a tray of CUPS. An attractive PARTY CHICK follows his every move.
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These will be ready in 15 minutes. PARTY CHICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (putting it together) So it's like jello. With vodka. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm hmm. You get drunk while you enjoy a delicious gelatin snack. PARTY CHICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How come no one ever thought of this before? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't know. I just invented it. Party chick looks into his eyes, dreamily. PARTY CHICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate you. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (way too heartfelt) I love you.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE LIVING ROOM
dialogues.text: Lou PLAYS AN ELECTRIC KEYBOARD for about 15-20 people. He performing Ace of Base's "The Sign" and SINGING PASSIONAT Adam walks up to where Jacob aims a large VIDEO CAMERA. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did a bunch of drugs and went on a rant about how much he resents Ace of Base. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That band's from the 90s. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. He made me borrow Tad's video camera. He wants to document the performance and sue the band for infringement when we get back. Adam sees Tad and Chaz behaving like cocks across the roo making hot girls drink too much.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: Tad and Chaz) So, you like these guys? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're rich, popular, and they shower me with compliments. They're pretty much the best friends I've ever had.

dialogues.speaker: ON A BALCONY
dialogues.text: A CROWD gathers around Phil, who has removed the cover of SPINNING INDUSTRIAL FAN. CROWD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phil! Phil! Phil! Like a zen master, Phil reaches out and GRABS A FAN BLADE stopping the fan WITHOUT INJURY. Everyone celebrates!

dialogues.speaker: IN THE KITCHEN
dialogues.text: Nick holds up a HOMEMADE BEER BONG, from which he drinks. has his own CROWD rooting him on. NICK'S CROWD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick! Nick! Nick! He finishes the last of the beer, and the crowd celebrate PARTY GUY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy should be in charge of everything! NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE LIVING ROOM
dialogues.text: Lou SITS ON A COUCH with Michelle, one of the girls we me earlier at the lodge. Her friend Sandy sits across from t next to Jacob, who looks uncomfortable. SANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth or dare? Lou confers with Michelle before answering. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dare.
Sandy and Jacob confer, figuring out the dare. Lou meets Jacob's eyes -- he smiles, knowing Jacob has his back. SANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, we dare Lou to put a Twizzler up his ass. Lou stands up and angrily points at Jacob. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You son of a bitch! Have you ever played this game before? It's supposed to be awesome! Lou nevertheless grabs a TWIZZLER from the snack bowl and shoves it down the back of his pants. His face contorts uncomfortably and he is almost on the verge of tears. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a horrible thing you're doing and I hope you never have to experience what I am currently going through. Lou sits down and Michelle consoles him. MICHELLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your turn! Truth or dare? Before Sandy can even confer with Jacob: JACOB (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth. Lou throws up his hands in frustration. He looks miserabl as Michelle confers with him. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grumbling to Michelle) I don't care. Whatever. This is not the point of the game. MICHELLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, each of you has to tell your darkest, most personal secret. Lou crosses his arms and shakes his head.
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh wow, all right. Let me think. I've never told anyone this, but I was afraid of scary movies until I was 18. I even ran out of the theater a couple of times. SANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh you poor thing! Come here... She takes Jacob's head to her chest and strokes it gently Lou makes a jerk-off gesture. SANDY (CONT'D) (SHY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure I should tell mine. MICHELLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! You have to! SANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, but you can't laugh. LOU (WHO CARES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We promise. Let's hear it. SANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this one time me and my friend Lori took a train to Baltimore. It was the summer and we wanted to party, but we had no money. So Lori found this businessman who was also looking for a good time and told him that we'd give him a half and half for seventy-five dollars. You know -- a suck and fuck. Lou and Jacob look shocked with the MATTER OF FACT storytelling. Michelle smiles. She's heard it before. SANDY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, we get him up to his room and Lori starts going down on him, but I really wasn't into it. So I broke a piece of the bathroom mirror and used it to cut his artery on the-heck. Right here... She rubs Jacob's neck, pointing it out. SANDY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He bled for about an hour before he died. (MORE)
SANDY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afterwards, we took his wallet to the bar and found out he only had forty-seven dollars. Michelle GIGGLES. SANDY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michelle! You said you wouldn't laugh! MICHELLE (GIGGLING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry! Jacob and Lou look shell-shocked.

dialogues.speaker: IN ANOTHER ROOM
dialogues.text: Adam sits in a chair in the corner, secluded. To his LEFT Nick's in the kitchen, catching POPCORN in his mouth and earning accolades from all his new fans. To Adam's RIGHT -- The truth or dare game devolves, as Michelle PIERCES LOU' EAR. He screams in pain, but at the end, he has a GOLD ST in his RIGHT EAR. Lou points at Jacob. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
