dialogues.text: There was just enough Red Bull for the kitten. Not nearly enough for a human. It's a weight distribution thing. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you even figure this out? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scientific method. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He bet me 20 dollars I wouldn't lick the stain. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought it was some guy's jizz. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with you? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It worked, didn't it? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, except one little problem. There's no Red Bull in 1987. For a moment, they're all bummed again. Then Adam gets an encouraged look on his face. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes there is! Come on! Adam heads for the door, as Lou and Nick follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jennie instructs a group of TEENAGERS on the basics of skiing, as Adam approaches, with Nick and Lou in tow.
JENNIE (CONCERNED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't be here. If Blaine sees you, he'll snap your neck. I told him I blew you and he's not happy. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would you do that?! Behind Adam, Nick looks at the group of TEENS and his eye almost BUG OUT. He elbows Lou. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers, teeth clenched) Look. Lou looks to where Nick is looking: YOUNG ADAM, YOUNG NICK, and YOUNG LOU wait with other kid for Jennie to return to their lesson. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit! Lou immediately approaches the kids, even as Nick tries t hold him back. NICK (TEETH CLENCHED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: where the fuck are you going?! Lou walks right up to his YOUNGER SELF and looks himself square in the face. YOUNG LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell do you want, old man? Lou PUNCHES his YOUNGER SELF in the face. Young Nick and Young Adam are freaked out, as is regular Nick. Adam does notice, as he's arguing with Jennie.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG LOU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What the fuck, dude?! I think you broke my nose! My parents are gonna sue the shit out of you! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herschel and Evelyn aren't gonna do a damn thing. They're losers. YOUNG LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know my parents?
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me. Start putting minoxidil on your scalp. Tonight. Then, when Propecia comes on the market, start taking it. Every day. Hair is important. YOUNG LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't give a shit about hair. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will! (leans in, quietly) Or I'll tell everyone about how you jerked off to that issue of Playgirl. YOUNG LOU (QUIETLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was confusing! There were naked people and it had "girl" in the title! LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you don't have to justify to me, pal. YOUNG LOU (FREAKED OUT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm God.

dialogues.speaker: ON ADAM AND JENNIE
dialogues.text: JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. You wanna see Blaine? It's your funeral. He's in the warehouse at the end of Lawrence. Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam walks off the mountain with Nick and Lou. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moment of truth. Lou takes off his hat and feels his scalp - no hair.
LOU (CONT'D) (LOOKS BACK)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That fucker! Just then, Lou's NOSE SLIGHTLY SHIFTS, the result of bein broken and never fixed. It stays this wa for the rest of the movie. Lou touches his nose. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, that's just great. Jacob runs up, in a friendlier disposition. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey guys! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were with douche patrol. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I was. But it turned out those guys are date rapists. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, where are we going? Adam gets a look of determination again. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To get my bag. We get that, we have the Red Bull, and our ticket home. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! The race is on! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What race? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duh, it's 1987? We're at a ski resort? (SHAKES HEAD)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Disputes like these are settled with a downhill ski race. Usually at dawn. It's the law.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and the guys step into a warehouse. WET FLOOR, CHAIN hanging from the ceiling for no reason, STEAM rising from grates. As they enter, Chaz pulls down a large GARAGE DOO Up ahead, Blaine sits on some CRATES with Tad. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to my lair. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You live here? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, this is kind of a shitty place to live. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't live here. Adam approaches Blaine, trying to speak maturely. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look. Blaine. I think we got off on the wrong foot. You have some issue with me. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get blown by my girl? I'll say that's one hell of an issue. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! You got blown?! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She didn't blow me. She lied to you to make you jealous. I'm not trying to steal Jennie. I just wanna get my bag. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, your bag. I was wondering when you'd come around for that. Tad holds up the BACKPACK over by the crates. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'll just take it and get out of your way.
BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will? Adam EXTENDS HIS HAND. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whattya say? Can we work this out like gentlemen? Blaine PULLS A KNIFE. Tad and Chaz also PULL KNIVES. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this town's obsession with knives? BLAINE (MENACING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about I work this out like... a butcher? Just then, LIGHT SPILLS INTO THE DARK WAREHOUSE. A GUY in polo shirt stands in a dooorway.

dialogues.speaker: GUY IN POLO SHIRT
dialogues.text: Hey! Scumbuckets! Back to work! Like naughty children being caught red handed, Blaine and goons lose the knives and hustle toward the open door. Blaine grabs the backpack from Tad. Adam and the guys follow through the door and into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, Nick, Lou, and Jacob are confused, as Blaine, Chaz, Tad spring to action, helping CUSTOMERS choose sunglasses Jacob approaches Tad and Chaz, who look embarrassed. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys are posers! You're not better than me! TAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob, I wish you hadn't seen us like this. Adam stands near Blaine, who helps a WOMAN. BLAINE (TO WOMAN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These would look so good with your light complexion.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen asshole! I want my bag! BLAINE (TO WOMAN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you excuse me for a moment? Blaine walks behind the COUNTER and SHOVES THE BAG in a S BLAINE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safe's on a timer. It'll open tomorrow. We race at dawn. Winner gets the bag. Loser leaves town. Lou turns to Nick. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? I told you! ADAM (TO BLAINE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wanna race you. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I guess you don't want your bag. (SMIRKS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you at dawn. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your girlfriend sucks one hell of a mean dick. Adam makes a SLURPING SOUND and Blaine fumes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick, Lou, and Jacob walk behind Adam, who looks pissed. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we gonna do? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That chick blew you?! ADAM (INTENSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a race to win. Europe's "The Final Countdown" begins playing over a MONT -- Skis are sharpened.

-- Gear is polished. -- In the SUITE, Adam gets dressed in his GEAR. -- On a SMALL HILL, Jacob demonstrates some moves on skis Adam doesn't get it. He's keeps falling. -- On the hill, Jacob teaches Adam how to SNOWBOARD. Adam having an easier time standing up on the snowboard. -- The guys keep Adam awake and use a homemade SCALE MODE the mountain to formulate a plan, a la Iron Eagle. -- Back on the hill, Jacob and Adam snowboard next to eac other. Adam makes it by a couple of obstacles. Jacob look proud of him. -- The guys play an ATARI SKI GAME, trying out a strategy Jacob uses a POINTER, looking disappointed. -- On the hill, Adam easily maneuvers by a few trees on t snowboard, kicking up snow and HIGH-FINING Jacob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLO-MO HERO SHOT of our four guys, as they ascend the top the mountain. If we didn't know any better, it would look like Tony Scott directed a ski movie. END MONTAGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few yards away from Nick and Lou, Adam sits on the grou as Jacob helps him strap into the snowboard. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stick to the plan and you're gonna be fine. Adam looks at Jacob seriously for a moment. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob, I'm sorry for not always being the big brother I should've been. I was away at college, Mom gave you my Sega - there were a whole host of issues. Jacob nods and speaks genuinely to Adam too.
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. I'm sorry too. I put a few things before my family and took my guilt out on you. (puts it together) I guess it was an inevitable I'd end up part of a roofie ring. Adam smiles and extends his hand. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friends? Jacob takes Adam's hand and helps him to his feet. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brothers. They EMBRACE. Lou looks disgusted. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gay. Blaine and his goons approach from below. Adam puts on hi game face. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't think you guys would show. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was my idea. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gonna make my victory taste all the more sweeter. Like a Peach Snapple. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A what? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll see. Blaine actually looks rattled, as the two men get lined u Adam is on a SNOWBOARD. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not afraid of getting beat by a guy on a skateboard, are you?
BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen you in action. You're reckless and terrible. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reckless and terrible's my middle name. Because I feel the need... (pulls on goggles) for speed! Chaz holds out his arm as a starting line. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catch ya at the bottom. CHAZ

dialogues.speaker: 3, 2, 1... GO
dialogues.text: Blaine takes off down the mountain like a professional skiier, which he pretty much is. Adam looks toward Jacob, who demonstrates the proper CROUCH. Adam slowly picks up speed, starting at about one mile per hour. Blaine looks back and can't believe how easily he's gonna coast to victory. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here goes nothing. Instead of weaving back and forth, Adam just stays in the crouch, PICKING UP SPEED. He recklessly PASSES BLAINE, despite the many TREES and OBSTACLES on the course. He BEARS DOWN AND TRAVELS LIKE A BOLT OF LIGHTNING! Blaine finds the guts to alter his STYLE, skiing more recklessly too. He begins catching up to Adam. Blaine skis up next to Adam - they're both going full for BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't beat me! I was born on this mountain! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was born in a hospital like a normal baby! Adam bends down and picks up even more speed, NARROWLY MISSING trees and rocks. Blaine tries to keep up. Adam has the finish line in his sights, when he rolls the dice once too often. His SNOWBOARD GETS SNAGGED on a rock and Adam TUMBLES TO THE GROUND.
The SNOWBOARD FLIES OFF INTO THE AIR! CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phil stands against a SHED, as a GUY THROWS A HATCHET at just narrowly missing his arm. Phil FLEXES HIS MUSCLES, a HOT CHICK KISSES HIM. Then the SNOWBOARD FLIES INTO FRAME and SLICES OFF PHIL'S ARM, sending BLOOD SPLATTER EVERYWHERE! PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhh! My arm!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou watches with BINOCULARS and PUMPS HIS FIST. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Adam tumbles on the ground, Blaine smiles, thinking he the victory in the bag. But instead of stopping, Adam picks up speed, as he TUMBL LIMB OVER LIMB, like a snowball going down the mountain. With 50 YARDS to go, Blaine bears down and tries to catch Adam. It's gonna be close. At the FINISH LINE, Adam's CRUMPLED BODY passes the line first. Blaine pulls up, pissed off to lose the race. Adam's momentum carries him forward another 50 yards, whe he SMASHES INTO A DECK and finally comes to a stop. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large "BON VOYAGE" BANNER hangs in the room.

An ALL-OUT PARTY is going on in the guys' suite. GUESTS party everywhere, helping the guys celebrate. Sandy and Michelle flirt with the two dudes who took brie possession of the Towel Guy yesterday. The Coke Guy from the gondola talks with the Brew Haus Waitress. Adam's leg is in a CAST, as he sits at a table with Jacob Nick, and Lou. The OPEN BACKPACK is in front of them. The DRINK and TOAST. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it, man. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, it was nothing. I just fell down the mountain. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a beautiful fall. Lou goes into Adam's backpack and pulls out the SANDWICH, which he begins unwrapping. ADAM (DISGUSTED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me you are not going to keep eating that. Lou takes a bite and SHRUGS. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chicken parm. It's my favorite. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chicken parm? Adam takes the sandwich from Lou. He looks at it closely. ADAM (CONT'D) (LAUGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chicken parm. On this roll. The guys look confused, as Adam stares at the sandwich. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, what is it? FLASHBACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Lily nervously make eye contact at the front of restaurant, as a SNOOTY HOST shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: It was our first date. You know those nights that are just perfect? This wasn't one of those nights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Lily sit through "From Justin to Kelly," the American Idol movie. They don't enjoy themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam inspects a HUGE DENT in the side of his car. As he d so, a car drives by, SPLASHING A PUDDLE on Lily.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: If Lily knew where we were, I'm sure she would've walked home. And I wouldn't have blamed her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the RAIN, Adam and Lily run toward the entrance of a little deli. Inside the doorway, a LITTLE OLD WOMAN shake her head no. Adam pleads with his eyes and she lets them

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam and Lily sit and talk animatedly at the counter in t small, empty deli, eating SANDWICHES.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: We were so hungry by the time we found that deli, we would've eaten anything. So what if it wasn't foie gras and pino noir. It was chicken parm and Italian soda. And it couldn't have been more perfect. BACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys enjoy listening to Adam's story.
NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sandwich was special, huh? ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could say that. You could also say it gave me horrible diarrhea. FLASHBACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam SHITS HIS BRAINS OUT. When it looks like. he might b done, he turns around and VOMITS into the toilet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily waits by the bathroom door with some PEPTO and a GLA OF WATER. She looks very concerned.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Lily had every opportunity to leave. She didn't know me at all and she certainly didn't owe me anything after the night I put her through. But she stayed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam lays on the couch, his head in Lily's lap. She feeds him a little GATORADE. He keeps it down... for a moment. Then he turns and VOMITS into a BUCKET on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: She saw me at my worst and she stayed. Lily holds the bucket, as Adam pukes into it. BACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick, Lou, and Jacob look sick. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you see? This is more than a sandwich. It represents all that shit. All that puke.
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep the sandwich. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is disgusting. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gave me this as a reminder of her love. (THINKS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or to give me horrible diarrhea so I didn't leave the room during the bachelor party. But mostly as a reminder of her love. Adam holds up the sandwich. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the reason I need to go home. Adam stands up and walks toward the door with the sandwic ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna go prep the tub. Lou holds up a BAG OF CHIPS. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have any stories about these chips or can I eat them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam walks outside, taking a bite of the SANDWICH. He fin Jennie waiting in the TUB. JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are! ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jennie! What are you doing here? JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Making good on a rumor. Jennie STANDS UP in the tub and she's TOPLESS. Adam DROPS THE SANDWICH, shocked. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.
Jennie continues talking, shamelessly exposing herself. JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I saw you win that race against Blaine, everything changed for me. I realize now that I deserve more. I deserve a winner. (SEDUCTIVE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come and get your prize. Adam reaches next to the tub and hands her a ROBE. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I... can't. She covers up, embarrassed. JENNIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god. I missed my opportunity. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not sure there ever was an opportunity. Jennie, you're terrific. You've brought me so many moments of joy, you'll never know. But I shouldn't have given you the wrong idea. Jennie looks sad and vulnerable, as Adam talks. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truth is there's a girl I need to go see. We have plans to spend the rest of our lives together. And I can't wait any longer. (listening to himself) And I'm totally cool with it. Adam smiles, feeling the rush of knowing he's ready. But then he sees how sad Jennie is. He moves closer to her. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One day, you're going to find the right guy who's willing to give up everything and travel across time and space for your love. She nods and tears up a little bit, as Adam HUGS her. JENNIE (EMOTIONAL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would totally blow you right now.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you would. DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys stare at the tub, which continues to bubble, eve though it's not plugged in. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have to go yet, Adam. Things are just getting fun. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we can do whatever we want without any real consequences. That's a lot to give up. ADAM (NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's how I know I'm doing the right thing. Adam reaches in his backpack, but can't find the Red Bull He turns it inside out and shakes it -- nothing. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the Red Bull?

dialogues.speaker: BLAINE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: You looking for this? Across the patio, a drunk, disheveled Blaine holds the CA BLAINE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You couldn't leave well enough alone, could ya? You couldn't just win the race and call it a day? You had to have Jennie too. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want Jennie. BLAINE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's funny. I don't want this soda, either. Blaine smiles like an asshole. Adam's face goes desperate as Blaine OPENS THE CAN and DRINKS THE WHOLE THING. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nooooo!

Adam runs at Blaine and tackles him to the ground. On the ground, Adam BEATS THE LIVING HELL out of Blaine, messing his face. It makes the Jared Leto scene from Fight Club l tame. Eventually, Adam's friends pull him off. Adam crawls to the Red Bull can and it's empty. ADAM (CONT'D) (DESPERATE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? Lou takes Blaine's pulse. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit! You may have killed this guy! No wait... wait... I've got a pulse. Eh, so much for that. Nick puts his hand on Adam's shoulder. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry man. I'm really sorry. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Red Bull's gone. He fucked us. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not necessarily. Everyone looks toward Jacob. JACOB (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Red Bull isn't really gone. (points to Blaine) It's in him. A beat, as everyone sorta gets it. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's worth a shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adam, Nick, and Jacob sit in the tub. Adam crosses his fingers. Lou stands outside the tub, fully dressed. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Lou.
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah, I'll take a rain check. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, your lives at home sound all beautiful and happy with your barbecues and swimming pools and "oh, that sandwich reminds of some gay shit I did one time." Adam and Nick don't look thrilled to be reduced to this. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But my life back there sucks. And in case you haven't noticed, my life here fucking rules. So I have a coke problem? I'll go to rehab. I have no money? I'll stop winning sex and start winning dollars. Lou DRAGS BLAINE by the foot closer to the tub. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, I was tailor-made for 1987. And you'll excuse me, but I value banging young chicks way more than all of your friendships combined. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No offense. Adam, Nick, and Jacob kinda nod and understand. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, no, I get it. Lou goes around and gives them all hugs. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makes perfect sense, man. Lou squeezes Jacob's shoulder. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't hate you as much as I used to. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a little emotional) I hate you a little less also. Lou LIFTS BLAINE'S LIMP BODY.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, whenever you're ready, Lou. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One small step for man! One giant asshole puking in a hot tub! Here goes nothing! Lou does the HEIMLICH MANEUVER on Blaine. It takes ONE... TWO... THREE THRUSTS until Blaine PUKES IN THE TUB! For a second, it's just a BIG SPLASH of VOMIT and nothing else. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, well maybe if we-- A BRIGHT FLASH CONSUMES THE SCREEN! And when it dies down we see Adam, Nick, Jacob (and the floating puke) in the h tub where we left them. Only Lou is missing. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? Did it work? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't feel anything. JACOB (DISAPPOINTED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, look. They see PEOPLE walking by, wearing COLORFUL FLARED-OUT S ATTIRE. The place looks the same as it did two seconds ag NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dammit. Even the deck furniture's the same. We fucking blew it. It didn't work. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Lou?

dialogues.speaker: LOU, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Right on schedule! Lou walks toward them, but there's a lot that's "off" abo him, including HAIR PLUGS, JEWELRY, and a SHITLOAD OF PLA SURGERY (including a fixed NOSE) that makes him look at o older and younger. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh!
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, the face, eh? I was curious how you'd react. (DISAPPOINTED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't think you'd be scared. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're damn right it's me. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just traveled 23 years in three seconds. Took me 23 years. It's good to see you guys! JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're back? It all looks the same. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It better! You know how much I pay the groundspeople around here? A lot. But that's all right, I'm fucking loaded. Look at all this. Everyone looks confused. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you fill in some of the blanks for me, please? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll give you the short version, because time is of the essence. First of all, to settle an old bet, time most definitely has been moving forward. It is exactly three days since you've arrived here in beautiful Havenhurst. Jacob looks at Nick. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told you. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secondly, I'm filthy rich. Made sports bets. Sued Ace of Base. I own most of V ermont. (MORE)
LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been reimagining the state as my own personal playground. You could say I'm a little bit like Michael Jackson, except I don't fuck kids. Two YOUNG HOTTIES walk by and wave at Lou. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do fuck them, though. Haven't gone above 24 years old in 10 years and even then, it was a mistake. (REMEMBERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A horrible mistake. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, fuck, Lou what time is it? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way ahead of you, Adam. You have 2 hours to get to New Jersey in time for your rehearsal dinner. ADAM (DISAPPOINTED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great, I blew it. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not even a little bit. I have a helicopter waiting in the parking lot and a private jet on my airfield five minutes away. The guys look stunned. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had some time to plan. God, it's good to have you guys back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou's private jet takes off from the runway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys sit back and enjoy the plush surroundings and th beautiful FLIGHT ATTENDANTS aboard Lou's jet. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the way, Adam, I hope you don't mind. Right after you left, I fucked Jennie silly.
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would she have sex with you? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get the big time assist. All that talk of her finding the right guy who's willing to give up everything? Made her wetter than a log flume. (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's all-time top five. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good to hear. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou, I gotta ask you something. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time travel paradox. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly. Aren't there now two of you living here in 2010? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think really hard about that one. What happened to me when I was 19? Nick shrugs. He looks at Adam. Suddenly, both their eyes nearly pop out of their skulls. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way... ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You went missing and were never found. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you're gonna have some lingering memories of both versions. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute, what happened to... you know. Other Lou. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't wanna know. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lou...
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kid sucked, OK? He couldn't take even a little bit of direction. Pretty soon I realized that having two versions of the same dude walking around -- as cool as that sounds -- didn't make very much sense to me. NICK

dialogues.speaker: OK
dialogues.text: LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I took care of the problem. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to do it. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I killed myself. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it was really some existential shit. I mean, here I am committing homicide and I'm actually committing suicide. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could you? LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was easy actually. For a minute, I thought I might be dealing with that whole Timecop thing. You know, the same matter can't occupy the same space at the same time bullshit and we both go poof? Especially after that whole nose thing. But no, it was just a murder. I didn't suffer. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wanna hear any more.
LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was strangulation. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wanna hear any more! They sit in horrified silence for a bit. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll have to introduce me when we get there. Your families won't know me. Although I'm sure they're huge fans. (ABRUPT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So hey, getting married, huh? Taking the plunge! Adam looks disturbed. Nick looks confused. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This makes no sense at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily looks beautiful, surrounded by FAMILY and FRIENDS. Still, she looks distant and lonely. Until -- A LILY (the flower) comes into frame. Lily smiles and stands up. She turns around. Adam's standing there with a whole bouquet of flowers. Lily give him a BIG HUG AND KISS. When she's done: LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ever let me take your phone again! ADAM (COY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here on time. Just like I promised. Nick sits down next to COURTNEY and Jacob takes his seat. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (no nerves at all) I'm so happy to see you and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with you. LILY (TEARFUL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too!
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the one. Lily notices Adam's on CRUTCHES. LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, what happened?

dialogues.speaker: LOU, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: My fault entirely, madam! The room is ABUZZ with CHATTER, as Lou makes a nearly REG ENTRANCE, wearing a WHITE TUXEDO.

dialogues.speaker: GUY AT TABLE
dialogues.text: Hey, it's Lou Blustein! The whole room APPLAUDS Lou, as he walks in. Adam and the guys can't believe it. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was partaking in a little ski adventure and I mistakenly wandered into your fiance's path. His broken leg is my broken heart. My most humble apologies. Lou scrapes and bows and regally kisses Lily's hand. She looks genuinely flattered. Lou gets up and whispers to Adam. LOU (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? I'm awesome here. You shoulda stayed out of that tub. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick SLOW DANCES with Courtney. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was thinking we'd invite Adam and Lily over for dinner when they get back from their honeymoon. That's... if it's OK with you? COURTNEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why wouldn't it be OK with me? That sounds nice. (SMILES) (MORE)
COURTNEY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look so good in this shirt, by the way. Nice choice. She puts her head on Nick's shoulder as they dance. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... how are your parents? COURTNEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still working hard. I really wish they could retire already, but it's tough competing with the big chains. I mean, they just have the one store... FLASHBACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Japanese Businessman is on a PAY PHONE, speaking RAPI in Japanese. JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN (IN JAPANESE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiro-san! Cancel the paperwork! We have to get back to Tokyo. I have inside information that undermines the supermarket deal. Nick stands next to him, nodding and SMILING WIDELY. BACK TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick enjoys dancing with his mellow, awesome wife. NICK (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what they say about hard work. Builds character.

dialogues.speaker: BY THE BAR
dialogues.text: Adam orders drinks, as his PHONE RINGS. He picks it up an in an instant, JACOB IS STANDING RIGHT BEFORE HIM as a VE REALISTIC HOLOGRAM. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh!
JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is why we shouldn't have sold that iPod. Adam puts his hand through Jacob, who speaks with purpose JACOB (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Japanese have apparently cornered the technology sector over the past 20 years. We've dealt American businesses quite an irreparable blow. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean for us? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty much nothing for us personally. We just get cooler phones and iPods and shit. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Great! Jacob CLICKS OFF and disappears, as Lily approaches. Adam can't help but beam from ear to ear. ADAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so beautiful. LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you were only gone for a couple days, but I missed you so much. Adam takes her hand. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, let's get out of here. We have unfinished business. Lily smiles. She gets into it. LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about time. OK, what's the fantasy? ADAM (GENUINE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about you're the woman I love and I'm the man of your dreams? LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booor-ing!!
ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, you're a nurse and a snake bit my penis. LILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done and done. They bolt for the door and we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The party is winding down and only a FEW GUESTS remain. A table in the corner, Lou has an EXTENDED MAKE OUT SESSION with a STUNNINGLY BEAUTIFUL GIRL in her early 20s. They finally come up for air. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're friends with the bride? BEAUTIFUL GIRL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you keep a secret? I'm actually kinda crashing the party. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naughty girl. You're secret's safe with me. BEAUTIFUL GIRL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just in town for a couple of nights. I'm actually looking for my father. We've never met. LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm from here. Maybe I know him. BEAUTIFUL GIRL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His name is Hank Musselman. For a moment, Lou's expression FREEZES. He blinks. Then - LOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, never heard of him. He goes back to MAKING OUT WITH HER and we: FADE OUT. THE END
